title: mich
author: mich
content: Well this is 1 of my favorite games so I am very excited to play GTA 6. And then we can see a trailer for the game in this December.It has been 10 years since they gave us GTA 5. Is there any other GTA fans excited for this new GTA 6?  https://www.pcgamer.com/gta-6-will-reportedly-be-announced-this-week-ahead-of-december-trailer/

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: What a coincidence, I have been watching GTA 5 streamers since yesterday.  I am not yet done with GTA 4 and haven't played that much with my GTA V and GTA 6 is coming.  I have watched some reels about the GTA 6 and some devs also leaked images of it. Yeah, possible that it's for real and we have to wait for the oficial announcement til' it finally come.

comments.author: btcswimmer
comments.body: Quote from: mich on November 08, 2023, 06:55:21 AMWell this is 1 of my favorite games so I am very excited to play GTA 6. And then we can see a trailer for the game in this December.It has been 10 years since they gave us GTA 5. Is there any other GTA fans excited for this new GTA 6?  https://www.pcgamer.com/gta-6-will-reportedly-be-announced-this-week-ahead-of-december-trailer/Let's hope that it does not require a $20000 RTX 200 000 Ti to run...Many modern games are so badly optimized that you can't even run them on 5 years old high end GPUs.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: btcswimmer on November 09, 2023, 05:31:02 PMLet's hope that it does not require a $20000 RTX 200 000 Ti to run...Many modern games are so badly optimized that you can't even run them on 5 years old high end GPUs.That's right.Right now, they're going to celebrate their 25th anniversary. Rockstar is on 25th year already and this can be their anniversary launching for the GTA 6.Not a launch but likely a trailer for most of their fans. But for this release, I think that the graphics will be higher and likely gonna require some 2000 series for RTX.Hopefully it won't and it's still gonna be playable with low setting. Anyway, I've just started playing the GTA V that I've got only for free in Epic games.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Quote from: btcswimmer on November 09, 2023, 05:31:02 PMQuote from: mich on November 08, 2023, 06:55:21 AMWell this is 1 of my favorite games so I am very excited to play GTA 6. And then we can see a trailer for the game in this December.It has been 10 years since they gave us GTA 5. Is there any other GTA fans excited for this new GTA 6?  https://www.pcgamer.com/gta-6-will-reportedly-be-announced-this-week-ahead-of-december-trailer/Let's hope that it does not require a $20000 RTX 200 000 Ti to run...Many modern games are so badly optimized that you can't even run them on 5 years old high end GPUs.Well my nephews will be playing it on the ps4 so we do not need to worry about this.

comments.author: Suzume
comments.body: Those who are PC games in this forum they all no the crazy ness of GTA V. No PC game available who don't play and don't like the graphics of GTA V. It's a dream game of every PC game us and those who have good configuration PC must play this game a lot of time and because of the crazy ness of the game. Every GTA lovers wait for the next part. You can see from the starting of GTA all PC game because of it's interesting mission storyline etc. GTA lovers still waiting for GTA 6. Because GTA is a emotion for PC games.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well my nephews might have get a new system. I did read it will not be on the ps4 and will not be able to handle the old consoles. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SKvjR05U4sw

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: mich on November 11, 2023, 05:27:05 AMWell my nephews might have get a new system. I did read it will not be on the ps4 and will not be able to handle the old consoles. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SKvjR05U4swExpect it that when they release it, it's going to be power and graphics hungry. So with oour older consoles and potato PCs, we might need to upgrade.Quote from: Suzume on November 10, 2023, 12:50:27 PMGTA lovers still waiting for GTA 6. Because GTA is a emotion for PC games.Yes and that is because GTA will always be one of the most favorite games of everybody. I just don't understand what do you think about it as an emotional game for PC games because, console or PC, there's no need to compare them because both are enjoyable to play.

comments.author: bitnote
comments.body: gta fan from vice city, it's exciting to see gta 6

We only know the trailer will be released in December. But I heard some rumors it will be in March of next year.

comments.author: Jinx9975
comments.body: It has been 10 years since they gave us GTA 5. I am waiting for 6th edition.

comments.author: bitnote
comments.body: Quote from: Jinx9975 on November 15, 2023, 01:57:56 PMIt has been 10 years since they gave us GTA 5. I am waiting for 6th edition.missing vice city when i was teen and use to go to play on gaming shops.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: bitnote on November 16, 2023, 03:01:23 PMmissing vice city when i was teen and use to go to play on gaming shops.The same vibes, when we were kids we go to computer or internet cafes and we play there like just for an hour or two because rent during that time was already high and being a kid, we don't have much money.Anyway, for those that are missing Vice City, you can purchase it through Rockstar's official website.--> https://www.rockstargames.com/games/vicecityYes, why I am saying to purchase there? Please support the game and company itself because downloading it from the unauthorized websites might even contain you some malware.

And that's the one that I like to watch and not entirely a stream of theirs.Anyway, I'll check that guy you've mentioned.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well we do not know when the trailer is going to be released. But now there is rumors from Italy that it is going to be between December 3 and December 5.https://www.hindustantimes.com/technology/did-rockstar-just-reveal-the-trailer-release-date-for-gta-6-101700754375690.html

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well for getting us ready for the new GTA now Netflix is adding GTA. I think most of use who play this game have it but GTA 3, GTA Vice City, and GTA San Andreas will be here on December 14.https://www.theverge.com/2023/11/29/23981068/netflix-gta-trilogy-definitive-edition-mobile-release-date

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: mich on November 30, 2023, 08:37:31 AMWell for getting us ready for the new GTA now Netflix is adding GTA. I think most of use who play this game have it but GTA 3, GTA Vice City, and GTA San Andreas will be here on December 14.https://www.theverge.com/2023/11/29/23981068/netflix-gta-trilogy-definitive-edition-mobile-release-dateI've seen the trailer but I am confused. Is this show that will be on netflix or this is going to be a game made by netflix since it's Netflix games?I am no longer a subscriber of Netflix and that's why I am confused and based on the readings I did, this is going to be a game as well before the release of GTA 6.I honestly thought that this trilogy is going to be a movie that's based on the scenes from those combined GTA franchises.
